column1: procedure¦"apoc.text.phonetic"¦"apoc.text.phonetic(value) yield value - Compute the US_ENGLISH phonetic soundex encoding of all words of the text value which can be a single string or a list of strings"

column4: delta - Compute the US_ENGLISH soundex character difference between two given strings"

column3: replacement) - replace each substring of the given string that matches the given regular expression with the given replacement."
replacement) - replace each substring of the given string that matches the given regular expression with the given replacement."

column2: regex) - return all matching groups of the regex on the given text."

column4: delimiter) - join the given strings with the given delimiter."

column1: function¦"apoc.text.clean"¦"apoc.text.clean(text) - strip the given string of everything except alpha numeric characters and convert it to lower case."

column2: text2) - compare the given strings stripped of everything except alpha numeric characters converted to lower case."

column3: delim) YIELD value - left pad the string to the given width"
delim) YIELD value - right pad the string to the given width"

column2: [params]) - sprintf format the string with the params given"
